title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1: Inconsistency between documentation and actual behavior regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: In chapter 7.1.1 of the servlet30finalspec.pdf, it is mentioned that a custom name for session tracking cookies will also be used as the name of the URI parameter if session id is encoded in the URL. However, the actual behavior does not match the documentation.
OB: The page sets a cookie with the name 'MYSESSIONCOOKIE', but the 'Reload' link on the page uses 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name.
EB: I would expect the 'Reload' link to use the custom cookie name ('MYSESSIONCOOKIE') instead of 'jsessionid'.
SR:
1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file.
2. Open the URL 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp'.
3. Click on the 'Reload' link on the page.
4. Observe that the URL includes 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name.
